faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions :grey_question:
:question: What is Casual UHC???! :quest: Casual UHC or sometimes referred to as TMC UHC is an event where
different Technical Minecraft Server's duel it out in a world.
UHC is a pvp game where players in their teams are spread across a world
with a shrinking world border. The catch is that you do not naturally regenerate health.
:question: What timezone is the UHC anno: The time in announcements is in your local time, the time is specifically for YOU!
:question: Can I stream the event :quest: Yes! You are welcome to also share your stream in <#763142666292559882>.
:question: I can\u0027t make the event w: Yes, just message Sensei and he'll add you (you still need to add yourself to the team Discord bot, more about that in the info section).
:question: Can I spectate the game? :que: Yes, if you do not add yourself to a team you'll just be put in spectator mode and you can watch the game!
Be sure to read the rules about spectating in <#744168942842413099>.
:question: Can xyz server be added to th: There's a queue for servers wanting to join UHC.
Please get xyz's server admin to contact Sensei.
:question: UHC in Minecraft 1.8 :questio: Sorry, this will probably not happen.

info.title: UHC Info :book:
Gameplay:
The world border will begin with a size of 6000x6000 blocks (centered on 0,0) and your team will be randomly placed in the map when the game starts.
There will be a 10 minute grace period where PVP is disabled. After this is over the world border will begin to shrink!
The world border will shrink to a size of 20x20 automatically. If there are still players remaining after 5 minutes
of reaching this point all players will receive a glowing effect. If the game continues to drag out further the world border will be shrunk further.
You will be able to **break** and **place** blocks **outside** the world border. However as a result of this modification
when you are outside of the world border it will be appear to be flipped (so your client believes you are still inside).
To know which direction you must go to exit the border there will be text across your screen or alternatively an arrow will be
rendered below your feet in the direction you should run.
Features:
Other useful features that are a part of UHC:
- Players drop player heads on death, these can be 'eaten' for some regeneration.
- Surrounding the player heads with gold ingots in a crafting table grants golden heads with even better effects!
- Apples have a increased drop rate from oak and dark oak leaves.
- Regular bows have a 1 second cool down after firing.
- Your teammates will glow during the game, you can toggle this with the `/teamglow` command
- Night vision is toggleable for all players with the `/fullbright` command.
- You can message your teammates your co-ordinates using the `/pos` command.
- You can toggle your co-ordinate and world border distance overlay (above your hotbar) with the `/coords` command.
- When in spectator you can use the `/s <player>` command to teleport to other players.
- Once the UHC has started if you type in chat you will automatically send it to your team chat.
- Prefix your message with `!` to talk in global chat after UHC has started.
Teams:
For main events, teams will always consist of 5 people.
This does **not** mean you need a full team to participate in the events.
If you do not have a full team you are welcome to join another team for that event.
To be able manage your teams you must use the Discord bot:

``` /team add <server> <username>
/team remove <server> <username>
/team info <server>```

All the information from the discord bot is **automatically** transferred to the Minecraft server to create the teams
so if you want to play you must add yourself to your team on Discord.
If you are late to the party you can message Sensei on Discord and I will be able to add you into the game.
MOre info!!!!

suggestions.title: How to Use Suggestions
Type Your Suggestion: A thread will automatically be created where you can put more details about your suggestion.
Use Reactions: Reactions are generally a good way to gauge whether people like the idea of a suggestion.
Please don't go over the top with unnecessary reactions, usually :thumbsup: and :thumbsdown: are good enough.
Feedback: Feel free to talk in the thread about the suggestion, but please keep discussions civil.

rules.title: UHC Rules!
:scroll: Mods:
Please refrain from using mods as much as possible, it makes it fairer for everyone!
Night vision is provided in game, alternatively you may use gamma override.
You may use resource packs that do not give you an advantage.
You may **not** use any features from mods/hacks that change the behaviour of the client to
give you an advantage. This includes the following:
- **Disabling fog**, this is not possible in Vanilla.
- **Placement tweaks**, placing blocks where you wouldn't be able to in Vanilla (e.g. flexibleBlockPlacement).
- **HUD mods**, providing you with information that you would otherwise not know, (e.g. displaying other player's health).
- **Minimap mods**, minimaps are not available in Vanilla.
You may use mods that display information that you would otherwise already know (e.g. enabling co-ords in MiniHud).

You may use any tools that are provided in vanilla, (e.g. F3 debug tools).
If you are **unsure** about any mod, please message Sensei.
:scroll: Exploits:
Use of any exploits are **strictly prohibited**.
Exploits are the use of a unintended bug to gain an advantage, this includes:
- **X-ray glitches**
- **Invincibility glitches**
- **Duplication glitches**, TNT is an exception to this.
:scroll: PVP:
Some rules are in place to make PVP fair and more enjoyable:
- **No Portal trapping/camping**, no one wants to die leaving or entering the Nether or End, other types of traps are permitted.
- **No Sky Basing**, do not build a base high up in the sky. If you are camping in a structure that is over
20 blocks from the ground you will be asked to move.
- **No Nether Roof**. Please. Just. Don't.
- **No Instant Health Potions**, these are too broken.
- **No Level 2 Potions**, you cannot brew any level 2 potions.
- **No Cross Teaming**, this creates an unfair advantage.
:scroll: Voice Chat: Please be respectful of everyone in a voice chat.
And please be mindful that others may be streaming so avoid using
profanity in public voice chats and remain family friendly!
:scroll: Spectators: however it is understandable that you may want to be in voice with your team.
Please be mindful that you **do not share information** that your team would not
otherwise know. This also applies to the in game chat.
:exclamation: Gentleman\u0027s rules: These rules do not cover absolutely everything, please do not try
to find loopholes to work around the rules.
:exclamation: Questions: If you are unsure about anything please ping <@546239692048302091>.
